title: Reservations to be developed for the intended purposes along with permissible uses & ancillary activities
clause_text: Reservations to be developed for the intended purposes along with permissible uses & ancillary activities. Reservations to be developed for the intended purposes or as per Accommodation Reservation.

source_pdf.text_snippet: Reservations to be developed for the intended purposes along with permissible uses & ancillary activities.
